trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be dragged by the user.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo que pode ser arrastado pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The Thumb control can be included in another control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, to let the user change the control's value.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de botão do controlo pode ser incluído no outro controlo, tais como um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controlo, para permitir que o utilizador altere o valor do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: The Thumb can also be used to resize controls.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser utilizado o botão para redimensionar controlos.

trans-unit.source: For example, a Thumb control in the corner of a window can provide a location for the user to click with the mouse to start a resize operation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um controlo de botão no canto de uma janela pode fornecer uma localização para o utilizador clicar com o rato para iniciar uma operação de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: Thumb provides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> events to manage drag operations associated with the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Botão fornece <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>arraste de eventos para gerir operações associadas o ponteiro do rato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the left mouse button, the Thumb control receives logical focus and mouse capture, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador prime o botão do rato à esquerda, o controlo de botão recebe o foco lógico e captura do rato e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: While the Thumb control has focus and mouse capture, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event can be raised multiple times without limit.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o controlo de botão do controlo tem foco e rato capturar, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>evento pode ser gerado várias vezes sem limite.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the left mouse button, the Thumb control loses mouse capture and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador liberta o botão do rato à esquerda, o controlo de botão perde a captura do rato e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The event information provides a change in position, but does not reposition the Thumb.
trans-unit.target: As informações de evento fornece uma alteração na posição, mas não reposicionar o botão.

trans-unit.source: You must manually change or reposition the Thumb or any other elements that you want to resize or change as a result of the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Manualmente tem de alterar ou reposicionar o botão ou a outros elementos que pretende redimensione ou alterado como resultado da operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: The Thumb control does not provide drag-and-drop functionality.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de botão não fornece a funcionalidade de arrastar e largar.

trans-unit.source: A Thumb control can receive mouse capture, but cannot receive keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo de botão do controlo pode receber a captura do rato, mas não consegue receber o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> property that corresponds to keyboard focus is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>que corresponde ao foco do teclado for definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value overrides the parent class <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> that sets this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este valor substitui a classe principal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>que define esta propriedade para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: To provide drag capability, class handling is provided for the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> events.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer a capacidade de arrastar, processamento de classe é fornecido para o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>e <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a Thumb is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that scrolls content in a viewable area, or viewport, the size of the Thumb reflects the size of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Quando um botão faz parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controlo desloca conteúdo numa área visível ou janela viewport, o tamanho do botão do controlo de reflete o tamanho da janela viewport.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control that is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte ilustração mostra um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>controlo que faz parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") ## Customizing the Thumb Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Thumb controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![Ilustração de ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "ilustração da barra de deslocamento") # # personalizar o botão do controlo para aplicar as mesmas definições de propriedade para controlos de botão de múltiplas, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Pode modificar a predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para lhe dar controlo um aspeto exclusivo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo de existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Thumb, see [Thumb Syles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e Estados que são específicos para o botão, consulte [botão Syles e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controlo podem ser definidas pelo estilo de predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo predefinido, a propriedade poderá alterar o valor predefinido do quando o controlo é apresentado na aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo predefinido é determinado pelo qual tema de ambiente de trabalho é utilizado quando a aplicação está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [predefinido o WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual apenas terá um efeito se essa propriedade ambos presentes no modelo do controlo de botão predefinido e é definida através da utilização de um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na secção "Alterar o Visual estrutura de um controlo" [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Cancels a drag operation for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a operação de arrastamento para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> has mouse capture and logical focus, this method removes mouse capture and raises a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>tem captura do rato e lógico foco, este método Remove captura do rato e gera um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controlo perde a captura do rato.

trans-unit.source: This DragCompleted event occurs when the left mouse button is released or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Este evento DragCompleted ocorre quando o botão esquerdo do rato é libertado ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controlo recebe captura do rato quando o utilizador prime o botão esquerdo do rato ao colocar em pausa o ponteiro do rato sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse when the DragCompleted event occurs is provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs> of the last <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: A posição do rato quando o evento DragCompleted ocorre é fornecida pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs>do último <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Encaminhados informações sobre eventos ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Estratégia de encaminhamento | Bubbling | | Delegado | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"> </xref> evento encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs one or more times as the mouse changes position when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has logical focus and mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre uma ou várias vezes, como as alterações de rato posicionar quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controlo tem foco lógico e um rato capturar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controlo recebe o foco e rato captura quando o utilizador prime o botão esquerdo do rato ao colocar em pausa o ponteiro do rato sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control loses mouse capture when the user releases the left mouse button, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controlo perde a captura do rato quando o utilizador liberta o botão do rato esquerdo ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: A new DragDelta event occurs each time the mouse position moves on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Um novo evento DragDelta ocorre sempre que a posição do rato se move no ecrã.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this event can be raised multiple times without a limit when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control has mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, este evento pode ser gerado várias vezes sem um limite quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controlo tem de captura do rato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Encaminhados informações sobre eventos ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Estratégia de encaminhamento | Bubbling | | Delegado | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"> </xref> evento encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control receives logical focus and mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controlo recebe o foco lógico e captura do rato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controlo recebe o foco e um rato captura quando o utilizador prime o botão esquerdo do rato ao colocar em pausa o ponteiro do rato sobre <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Encaminhados informações sobre eventos ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Estratégia de encaminhamento | Bubbling | | Delegado | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"> </xref> evento encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has logical focus and mouse capture and the left mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controlo tem foco lógico e um rato capturar e o botão esquerdo do rato é premido.

trans-unit.source: When the IsDragging property changes its value, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade IsDragging muda o respetivo valor, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsDragging has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: Iniciando com o .NET Framework versão 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsDragging tem um setter protegido.

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar esta funcionalidade, a aplicação deve visar o .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has focus and mouse capture; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controlo tem foco e rato capturar; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ThumbAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ThumbAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*> property.
trans-unit.target: Responde a uma alteração no valor do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação processa a <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>eventos definindo <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: Also, this method gives the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> logical focus and mouse capture, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, este método proporciona o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>lógico foco e captura do rato e define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: This implementation also raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação também gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação processa a <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>eventos definindo <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: Also, this method removes mouse capture from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, este método Remove captura do rato no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>e define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: This implementation also raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação também gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> has logical focus and mouse capture, this implementation raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event when the mouse moves.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>tem foco lógico e um rato capturar, esta implementação gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>eventos quando o rato se move.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event is handled by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Neste cenário, o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>evento é processado pelo definição <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.
